---
title: "insect repellents"
output: html_notebook
---

## Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## read in data

```{r}
(repellents=read_table("repellent1.txt"))
```

looks good

predict hours of protection from other things

```{r}
repellent.1=lm(protection~type+cost,data=repellents)
summary(repellent.1)
```

## plot

```{r}
ggplot(repellents, aes(x=cost, y=protection, colour=type))+geom_point()
```

write as delimited

```{r}
write_delim(repellents,"repellent.txt"," ")
```
